Html:
Is there a way to mark a panel as Brighter or Dimmer or different color somehow?

Why?
I am using GMAP for a cleanup map activity,
and if someone has already cleaned up an area, I
am looking for an easy way to tell them.

My thought was that I might could make the panel darker so it looks "gone" (eg cleaned up)...

thanks for reading!
-cellurl
markers with different levels of transparency?

I mean the map itself, not the markers. Is there any easy way to "dim" a particular map-square? If not, yes I could mess with the marker colors, but if I can make the panels dim, it would look cooler when zoomed out a bit. Or maybe I can "replace" panels with a blank one somehow....
